name: StateBehaviours
author: NotAKidoS
description:
Adds a couple State Machine Behaviours for avatar creators to tinker with until native solutions are released.

Simple Driver (OnEnter, OnExit)
Set, Add, Random, Copy

Update Driver (OnUpdate)
PlayTime, NormalizedTime, Lerp

Body Control (OnEnter, OnExit)
Toggle VRIK limb(s) weight or autofootstep.

These behaviours are **Local Only** and only function on your own avatar.
You will need to download the accompanying Unitypackage under **Requirments** to add and upload with in Unity.
